warriors.name: Farmer
warriors.description: +2 gold after wave for each surviving farmer
warriors.description2: +4 gold after wave for each surviving farmer
warriors.description3: +6 gold after wave for each surviving farmer

warriors.name: Fire starter
warriors.description: Creates a bonfire that deals 40 damage per second
warriors.description2: Creates a bonfire that deals 60 damage per second
warriors.description3: Creates a bonfire that deals 80 damage per second

warriors.name: Aura ranger
warriors.description: When alive give all defenders +10DMG. Effect does not stack
warriors.description2: When alive give all defenders +20DMG. Effect does not stack
warriors.description3: When alive give all defenders +30DMG. Effect does not stack

warriors.name: Nature ranger
warriors.description: Spawns 2 small tree warriors to fight for you
warriors.description2: Spawns 3 small tree warriors to fight for you
warriors.description3: Spawns 4 small tree warriors to fight for you
